
public class Method {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		
		int a=10;
		int b=20;
		
		
		Method obj=new Method();
		
		int result=obj.add(a,b);
		
		System.out.print(result);
		
		
	}
	
	
	public static int add(int x,int y)
	{
		int z=x+y;
		return z;
	}

}
